title: Coefficient Wave RR handlebar gives you an ultra-aero position, no illegal tuck needed
content:
The new Coefficient Wave RR handlebar takes its shaping to extremes to produce a more comfortable bar that puts you in a more ergonomic, aerodynamic position.
